errorRegex: .*Schema '.*/' does not exist or not authorized.*
.*Certificate for .* doesn't match any of the subject alternative names.*
solution: Your snowflake URL is incorrect. Go to https://app.snowflake.com and sign in. At the bottom left of the screen next to the Snowflake logo click the id. Hover over your account name in blue then click the link button which appears to copy your account URL. Go to your pipeline and edit your destination then paste this value into the account field.  Remove https:// from the start and .snowflakecomputing.com from the end then save your destination. See https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NVMFuRckAkEys7o903ulorHSBmu180U_/view?usp=sharing for a video explanation.
